page.title: 20The authors of the Survey.
page.content: The boys who participated in this survey are all members of the second year at Slindon College, a boy's boarding school. Although our area was rural in the extreme, the boys participated with interest and enthusiasm, often seeing things which might have been missed in our journeys around the squares. They are:_ Alistair Beatty,Paul Bowden,Terry Butler,Theo Collins,David Flint,Daniel Gilchrist,Edward Greensted,Dean Harris Mark Holland,Jeremy Howard,Andrew Howitt,Chris Hughes,Mark Hyland,Stuart Kirby,Jeremy Lee,Toby Maccabee,James Macfarlane,Chris Mannell,Graham Morris,Alex Munro,Charlie Norris,James Randall,Julian Stanford Smith,Joe Turner,and Mrs.Lynn Shaw. The photographs were taken by Michael Blunt.
